entry.name: descendant
entry.title: Descendant Selector ("ancestor descendant")

argument.name: descendant
argument.desc: A selector to filter the descendant elements.

entry.desc: Selects all elements that are descendants of a given ancestor.

longdesc.p: A descendant of an element could be a child, grandchild, great-grandchild, and so on, of that element.

example.desc: Mark all inputs that are descendants of a form with a dotted blue border. Give a yellow background to inputs that are descendants of a fieldset that is a descendant of a form.
